segments.text: Ahahah ! What is that thing on your couch ! It just moved !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Did you think it wasn't real ? That's my pet lizard .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You have a pet lizard ? Somehow I never would have imagined that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: His name is Grunt . Come closer and I'll properly introduce you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , he's perfectly harmless . And he's not afraid of strangers either . Here , hold him .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wow . He's heavy ! And his skin feels really cool .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Stick around and you'll get to know him better . He has a very unusual personality .
segments.speaker: S2
